description:
Omoi is a shinobi of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure], and a member of Team Samui. He is http://anidb.net/ch13998 [Killer Bee]`s student along with the other two members of his team.
He is a young, dark-skinned Kumo-nin with short, spiky, white hair. He is always seen sucking on a lollipop. As a sword user he carries his sword on his back with the one strapped Kumo Flack Jacket.
He has amazing speed, and is able to move around the battlefield in the blink of an eye. His taijutsu skill is good, being able to move around fluidly with his teammates. He also uses swordplay in his fighting style, like many Kumogakure shinobi.
name: Omoi
